metadata.scenario: Customer support interaction about a billing issue

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a charge on my bill. I was charged $75 for data overage, but I have unlimited data!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I understand your concern. I'm sorry for the trouble this has caused. Can I get your account number or phone number associated with the account, please?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 555-123-4567. This is really frustrating, I've been a loyal customer for years and never had this issue before.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Please give me a moment to review your account... Okay, I see the data overage charge. Let me check your data usage details.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, but how could I possibly go over my data limit if it's unlimited? What exactly am I paying for then?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I see that you're on the unlimited plan. There might have been an error in the billing system. I will submit a request to have the data overage charge removed from your bill. It should be reflected in your next statement. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: So, the charge will definitely be removed? I don't want to have to call back about this again next month.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, the request has been submitted, and I've added a note to your account. You should see the adjustment on your next bill. If you still see the charge, please don't hesitate to contact us again. We appreciate your patience!
